Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 20 to 32 years Candidates must be fluent in English with strong communication and conversational skills.Candidates with an IELTS score of 6.0 or above will be given preference. Responsibilities & Context Hassle Free Education is a leading student consultancy firm specializing in providing guidance and support for higher education in the UK, USA, Canada, Malta, and Finland. We assist students in securing admission to top universities, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free application process. Our mission is to provide students with the best opportunities for education abroad, all while making the process affordable and accessible. Working Hours: The Office working hours will be from 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM (UK Time) Job Responsibilities: Writing Personal Statements: Students' personal statements for university applications will be written and edited, ensuring they meet the specific requirements of the universities. CV Writing: Assist students in creating professional CVs tailored for university admissions, internships, or job applications. University Admission Application Submission: Oversee and manage the submission process of university admission applications, ensuring timely and accurate submission to relevant institutions. Providing Guidance on Course Selection: Help students select the right courses and programs based on their academic background and career goals. Counselling and Support: Offer one-on-one counselling to students regarding their university choices, application procedures, and scholarship opportunities. Reviewing Admission Requirements: Ensure that all application materials meet the specific criteria of each university, including deadlines, required documents, and additional submission requirements. Liaising with Universities: Communicate with universities to follow up on students' applications, provide necessary documentation, and resolve any issues during the application process.
